meanings.definition: The armed forces of a country.
meanings.sent1: The militaries protect our nation from harm.
meanings.sent2: Many countries have different militaries to defend their borders.
meanings.sent3: The militaries were so busy training that they accidentally marched into the wrong town!
meanings.sent4: The unity of the militaries is like a shield, strong and unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the militaries marching echoed through the valley, a powerful display of strength.

meanings.definition: The members of a military organization.
meanings.sent1: The brave militaries stood tall in their uniforms.
meanings.sent2: The militaries worked together to complete their mission successfully.
meanings.sent3: During the training exercise, the militaries accidentally locked themselves out of the barracks!
meanings.sent4: The militaries' dedication to their duty is a shining example to all.
meanings.sent5: The bond between the militaries is unbreakable, like a chain forged in battle.
